name: Cerebral
storyline: As Jesse Grey, a 16-year-old boy who finds himself trapped in his home, you will face confusion and fear to escape or outsmart the Vixi. This rogue A.I. will do anything to get your very existence, even if it has to kill and resurrect you a hundred times.
summary: Cerebral is a non-linear psychological horror game set in an ever-changing residential tower. Distinguish reality from illusion and survive this endless mind-bending nightmare, but death is not the end.
